features: [Privacy Protection]: Safeguard Your Privacy with the Suvivant Hidden Camera Detector. Defend against unwarranted surveillance in hotels and public spaces where hidden cameras may be discreetly placed in TVs, wall clocks, smoke detectors, mirrors, light bulbs, speakers, and other inconspicuous locations.

[Wide Frequency Range]: Enjoy a Broad Frequency Range: Detect frequencies from 1MHZ to 6.5GHZ, covering contemporary communications such as GSM, 3G, 4G, 5G, Bluetooth, and Wi-Fi 2.4G and 5.8G. Stay ahead of potential privacy breaches with advanced detection capabilities.

[Durable and Lightweight]: Durable and Lightweight Design: Weighing a mere 50 grams, this LED Hidden Device Detector is effortlessly portable. Tuck it into your handbags, purses, pockets, or suitcases to ensure the security of your personal and business information wherever you go.

[Use Scenarios]: Versatile Protection: From locker rooms and conference spaces to bathrooms, hotels, rental houses, and offices, this detector provides privacy protection and information security in diverse scenarios.

[Auto Power Saving Mode]: Intelligent and energy-efficient, the detector automatically powers off after 10 minutes of inactivity. Enjoy extended usage up to 720 hours without frequent recharging, providing continuous privacy protection.

[Prompt Assistance]: Encounter any dissatisfaction or issues upon receiving or using our product? Reach out to us immediately, and our dedicated customer support team will respond within 24 hours. Your concerns are our opportunity to exceed your expectations.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Spy Camera/ Hidden Devices/ GPS Tracker/ Bug RF Listening Device Detector

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Instructions for Use: Easy Start-up: Press and hold for 3-5 seconds until you hear a beep to activate. By default, it scans a wide frequency range from 1MHz to 6.5GHz. Signal Recognition: Move the device around to locate signals. Listen for alerts and gauge signal strength by the speed of the white light flashes. Adjustable Sensitivity and Detecte Camera: Toggle between 4 speed settings with a simple button press. The lights indicate sensitivity and range, with faster flashes meaning higher sensitivity and broader detection. Efficient Power Management: Automatically turns off after 10 minutes of inactivity to save energy and extend battery life.
